item.title: Quantum Machines launches Qualibrate open source framework to speed quantum computer calibration
item.description: Quantum Machines, a provider of advanced hybrid quantum-classical control solutions, announced today the release of Qualibrate.

item.title: Samsung boosts OLED TV gaming with Nvidia G-Sync compatibility
item.description: Samsung said its 2025 OLED TV lineup will feature Nvidia G-Sync compatibility, delivering smooth gameplay, low latency, and more.

item.title: Salesforce just unveiled AI ‘digital teammates’ in Slack — and they’re coming for Microsoft Copilot
item.description: Salesforce launches Agentforce in Slack, transforming workplace productivity with specialized AI agents that operate as digital teammates, replacing o...

item.title: Foxconn builds AI factory in partnership with Taiwan and Nvidia
item.description: Nvidia and Foxconn announced they are working with the Taiwan government to build an AI factory supercomputer.

item.title: Nvidia launches AI-first DGX Personal Computing Systems
item.description: Nvidia announced that Taiwan’s leading system manufacturers are set to build Nvidia DGX Spark and DGX Station systems.
